Gather natural nutrition, optimize core technology and sharing quality of life

title: Health Product Leader
who are we?
content: Beijing PuteHealth Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd. ( wholly owned by Beijing Fengli Jingqiu Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd.  ) was established in April 2017 located in Building 15, Zone II, No.31 Kechuang Street 13, BDA Beijing 100176, China.
PuteHealth has established long-term and friendly strategic partnerships with numerous well-known food and pharmaceutical manufacturers （BASF, Kerry, Roquette etc.）around the globe.

Adhering to the business philosophy of 'gathering natural nutrition, optimizing core technology, and sharing quality life', we provide consumers with comprehensive nutrition, health and care through diversified products and services. PuteHealth is also committed to satisfying the growing demand on health foods, dietary supplements, special medical nutritional foods and cosmetics and aiming to bring high quality life to our consumers.

product-1.title: Lycopene Vitamin E Soft Capsules
product-1.content: LycoVit®’s nutritional value and bioavailability are equivalent  to that of naturally occurring lycopene from tomatoes.LycoVit was the first concentrated lycopene source that received FDA-notified GRAS status in the United States (2002/2003).

product-2.title: Bai Jia Kang Fish Oil Softgel
product-2.content: Using fish oil extracted from marine fish as raw materials, it is refined by advanced technology using Norwegian PronovaPure high-content fish oil. Contains essential Omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids EPA and DHA

product-3.title: Curcumin Juicy Gummies
product-3.content: The turmeric plant comes from Southeast Asia and has a history of thousands of years. It has been used as a natural digestive aid and cooking spice. Like ginger, it comes from the ginger family, and its health benefits come from its roots.

product-4.title: Lutein Esters Gel Candy
product-4.content: Lutein esters are from South America Ecuador selected marigold;  Duchenella salina extracts is native to Australia's pink Lakes and is rich in β-carotene and other natural compounds of carotenoids.
